suncertify.ui

Class ConfigurationPropertiesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.ui.ConfigurationPropertiesManager

  • public class ConfigurationPropertiesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ConfigurationPropertiesManager manages the getting and setting of configuration data for the application. It is responsible for reading and writing all configuration properties from whichever configuration dialog is open to the suncertify.properties file when the application starts
    Author:
    Kieran O'Brien

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CLIENT_SERVER_HOST

      The path to the database file when running in server mode
      static java.lang.String SERVER_PORT

      The path to the database file when running in standalone mode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigurationPropertiesManager()
      Constructs a new ConfigurationPropertiesManager object first checking if the properties file exists, otherwise creates it
